Keywords: Fantastic Four , Scientist , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Peter Parker
Team Up
1
TEAM-UP: GHOST RIDER, HULK, WOLVERINE: At the beginning of the game, if all three listed characters are on your force, this game, Spider-Man and the listed characters can use the Fantastic Four, Spider-Man, X-Men and Mystics team abilities.
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
WHATEVER A SPIDER CAN: Super Senses, but succeeds on a 4-6. Protected: Outwit.
I'LL JUST WEB THIS GUY UP: When Spider-Man hits with a range attack, a hit target gains Immobile until your next turn.

ESD, 4-6 Super Senses and making them immobile is pretty crazy. With his hypersonic zipping him around he's going to be incredibly hard to kill if you get the right map with a bunch of elevation. He's very good.

October 16, 2020
Slade Wilson
While he's not exaclty what you want from a Spidey dial. He's still a playable character. Traited super senses on a 4-6 can be Amazing if the roles go your way. On the downside you are forced to play him strictly as a hit and run piece to get the most out of his potential. Not great, not terrible.

July 23, 2020
genjonah
While I absolutely agree that this dial is nowhere near Peter’s potential, and that it’s not looking good that we’ll ever get one actually accurate, I still like this dial. Again, it’s not nearly as tough as it should be, but it plays like I want him to in that he has great mobility and can tie down an opponent as he does it. It seems like WizKids consistently gets like, one or two aspects of Peter in each dial, never the full spectrum
July 22, 2020
DatHomieSilverSurfer
Look, a 75 point Peter Parker without any Willpower, Toughness, or any ability to take a hit or have any discernable super strength! We've never seen one of these before! ...Wizkids, Spider-Man is NOT in the same weight class as Nightwing. Stop making him weaker than a ten year old boy in tights with redundant dials and standing at the bus stop sculpts. I'm getting this piece purely for the costume, it's not a bad dial but it's so bland and generic and i'm sick of getting 1/4th of an actual spider-man dial. ...fun fact, Peter actually DOES get hit, a lot. Instead of the 4-6 SS, give him higher starting defense and some toughness, because half of the panels he appears in he tanks massive beatings
